unfriendly: Doesn't think that (cat) has been completely honest lately

neutral: Thinks that the prey (cat) is biting into on the other side of camp looks delicious
Saw (cat) take the last piece of prey from the freshkill pile

friendly: Has been spending time with (cat) lately

Helps (cat) work through something difficult that happened to them
close: Can't imagine their life if they never met (cat)
